metadata.title: CVE-2022-39319 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: FreeRDP is a free remote desktop protocol library and clients. Affectedversions of FreeRDP are missing input length validation in the `urbdrc`channel. A malicious server can trick a FreeRDP based client to read out ofbound data and send it back to the server. This issue has been addressed inversion 2.9.0 and all users are advised to upgrade. Users unable to upgradeshould not use the `/usb` redirection switch.

criterions.comment: freerdp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
